overview: They make a documentary about suicide to answer the question, why life is worth living, and fall in love with each other. Six months later, he will commit suicide, and she will try to make him the main character of the film, adding the footage of accidentally captured moments, phrases and jokes. As a result, the film becomes a reflection on the healing nature of art— the creation of the film becomes for the author a kind of psychotherapy.
title: Edit It As If I Disappeared
